name: Ghostblade Eidolon
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Blurred Form
entries: Attack rolls against the eidolon are made with disadvantage unless the eidolon is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The eidolon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The eidolon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eidolon makes two ghostblade attacks.

action.name: Ghostblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) force damage.
